append

public void append(String element)
Append a value to this array.

Parameters:
element - value to append to this array. Can be a string in double quotes, or a number, or true or false or null, or an object or an array.

appendString

public void appendString(String element)
Append a value to this array.

Parameters:
element - value to append to this array. It is automatically double-quoted to represent a string.
